summary: Excalibur is King Arthur's famous sword in the legend of the same name. It is believed to have magical powers and symbolizes Arthur's right to rule Britain. The story goes that Arthur pulled Excalibur from a stone, proving his royal blood. In some tales, this sword is also given to him by a mysterious lake creature. Other similar swords exist in these legends, but Excalibur is the most iconic.
title: Excalibur
